universum.studios.android.device

Class DeviceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.device.DeviceUtils

  • public final class DeviceUtils
extends Object
    Utility class that may be used to check whether the Android device is tablet or not via isTablet(Context).
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Detail

      • isTablet

        public static boolean isTablet(@NonNull
                               Context context)
        Checks whether the current Android device matches tablet specifications or not.

        Note, that this information is only approximate and shouldn't be used for core logic of any application.

        Checked specifications:

        • Screen.getDefaultOrientation()
        • Screen.getType()
        • Screen.getDiagonalDistanceInInches()
        • Screen.getDensity()
        Returns:
        True if the current Android device matches tablet specifications, false otherwise.
